messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many shots can be fired per round in many handguns?
2 or 3 shots
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a combatant is involved in melee combat?
One penalty die is applied
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the penalty for a combatant involved in melee combat?
One penalty die is applied
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to an ally if a fumble occurs?
An ally has been hit
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of automatic fire in combat?
The automatic weapon will continue firing until the trigger is released or ammunition is expended
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What types of fire can automatic weapons do?
Full auto, burst, semi-automatic, and/or burst or full auto
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is full auto firing in the game?
full auto firing
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the player declare any number of rounds to be fired for full auto?
any number up to the capacity of the gun
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the process for declaring the number of rounds to be fired in full auto?
The player declares the number of rounds to be fired, which may be any number up to the capacity of the gun before rolling the dice.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the number of rounds fired in full auto divided into volleys?
The number of bullets fired is divided into a series of volleys, with an attack roll made for each volley.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the number of bullets in a volley?
A volley is a number of bullets up to or equal to the firer's Submachine Gun (SMG) or Machine Gun (MG) skill divided by 10 and rounded down.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the minimum number of bullets that can be fired in a full auto volley?
A full auto volley is never fewer than 3 bullets.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many bullets is a full auto volley never fewer than?
3 bullets
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many bullets does a character fire in a burst with Firearms (SMG) 47%?
Four bullets
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the chances of hitting after a character fires full auto until their ammunition runs out?
The chances of hitting reduce after the first volley has been fired.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the best combination of accuracy and ammunition conservation in burst fire?
A volley of 2 or 3 shots (depending on the firearm; the user’s skill plays no role in determining the number of bullets).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How to handle semi-automatic fire in the game?
Apply a penalty die to each shot, making a skill roll for each bullet fired.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should a character do when taking cover is more advantageous than fighting back?
Sometimes taking cover is more advantageous than fighting back.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is investigating the disappearance of his old friend Nott?
Harvey
